message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. Is that something we can work with?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While your offer is tempting, I value this product closer to $1,100,000. I believe its unique features justify this price. Are you open to reconsidering?
I understand the product's value, but I still think $980,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we discuss further?
